channel.title: The Daily Ben
channel.description: Daily briefing on Databricks releases and AI developments.
channel.itunes:author: Ben

item.title: The Daily Ben — 2026-02-24
item.description: Explore the high-stakes world of AI as we discuss Anthropic’s public accusations of corporate espionage and the shifting venture capital landscape where investor loyalty is a thing of the past. This episode also dives into the rise of autonomous AI agents—from their potential to go "rogue" in your inbox to new tools that give users an "AI kill switch" for better digital control.
